title: Stars and Country
description: Stars and Country is an emotional soulmates Christmas romance that will warm your heart. She’s a music superstar going to a remote island to escape the Holidays, and he’s there to find his Christmas spirit back. Together, maybe they can help each other out and bring back the magic in their lives. Can he return the Christmas joy into her life? Christmas on an island, far from the carols and sugar cookies. Yes, please. Sign me up now. Until I get dumped into my worst nightmare, with no way to escape. My perfect non-Holidays vacation now doesn’t seem so perfect anymore. But then I meet him. Tall, handsome, caring. And asking me to partake in the tinsels and Santa madness. With his help, can I survive through the two most awful weeks of my life?
author: Emmanuelle Snow
